input.description: timeout-secs[Optional] Time in seconds after which the request will time-out of not completed. Default is: 60 secs

agent-prop-key[Optional] This tag contains the name of the property of agent by which we want to filter the search. Valid values - PrimaryManagementServerName,InstalledBy,ManuallyInstalled,version,ActionAccountIdentity,Name,Id,DisplayName,HostComputer, HostedHealthService,HealthState,PrincipalName,NetworkName,ComputerName,Domain,RequestCompression,CommunicationPort,ManuallyInstalled AuthenticationName,ActionAccountIdentity,HeartbeatInterval
agent-prop-val[Optional] This tag contains the value of the property specified in agent-prop-key.

operand[Optional] This tag specifies the operation that will be applied between 'agent-prop-key' and 'agent-prop-val'.
Valid values - equals, not equals, matches

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">get-agent</xsl:text> </operation-name> <timeout-secs> <xsl:value-of select="'${timeout secs}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <filters> <filter> <agent-prop-key> <xsl:value-of select="'${tok1}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </agent-prop-key> <agent-prop-val> <xsl:value-of select="'${tok2}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </agent-prop-val> <operand> <xsl:value-of select="'${tok3}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </operand> </filter> </filters> </command-parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Utility to create items xml for the process - "Find Agent"
